module.title: -ead noun-deriving suffix
module.p: -ead is a suffix used to create masculine derived common nouns from adjectives –

ul.li: dall blind ⇒ doillead degree of blindness
uasal noble ⇒ uaislead degree of nobility

module.p: [cf. – air ’uaislead however noble he may be, air a h-uaislead however noble she may be]
